title: Black Sabbath: Sabbath Bloody Sabbath
content:
\<img\>   
   
I checked on WTF, and didn't get anything close... any thoughts or ideas would be awesome. I assume its probally going to be a custom... But then again it might not.   
   
Thanks,

author: baskew

comments.content: Made me think of [ITC Honda](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120002553/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/honda/honda/testdrive.html?s=bloody&p=72), but that's obviously not it.
bradly is there a larger sample or is it just this one word?

![sabbath complete](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120002553im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47459.png)   
   
I know the 'S' are custom, and well, and there are some un-natural type edits.
